content:
Russian troops fired at the settlements of Giant and Kachkarivka of Kherson region. Two people were killed.

About thisinformsThe head of the Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin.

“Russian troops continue to kill the inhabitants of Kherson region. The invaders attacked a giant hour ago. They beat the residential sector, ”the message reads.

As a result of the shelling, a 70-year-old woman who was in the courtyard of the house was seriously injured. Unfortunately, her heart stopped at the ambulance.

Also last night the enemy dropped the explosive from the drone to the village of Kachkarivka. Injuries that are incompatible with life, received a 33-year-old resident.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Kherson the army of the Russian FederationremovedExplosive on a civilian car is injured.
title: In Kherson region, two people were killed through Russian attacks
description: About it reports the head of Kherson Ova Alexander Proudin. “Russian troops ...
author: Army Inform
